table.title: Largest Lists - # Items
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-inventory Type="List" Hidden="False" | stats latest(ItemCount) as ItemCount by Id,WebId,Title | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT Title as "Web Title" | sort - ItemCount | table "Web Title",Title,ItemCount | rename Title as "List Title",ItemCount as "# Items"

table.title: Largest Lists - Total Size
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-inventory Type="List" Hidden="False" | stats latest(ItemSize) as ItemSize by Id,WebId,Title | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT Title as WebTitle | eval ItemSize = ItemSize / 1024 | eval ItemSize = round(ItemSize, 2) | sort - ItemSize | table WebTitle,Title,ItemSize | rename WebTitle as "Web Title",Title as "List Title",ItemSize as "Size (kb)"

table.title: Empty Lists
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-inventory Type="List" Hidden="False" | stats latest(ItemCount) as ItemCount,latest(Created) as Created by Id,WebId,Title | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT Title as WebTitle | where ItemCount == 0 | table WebTitle,Title,Created | rename WebTitle as "Web Title",Title as "List Title"

table.title: Most Updated Lists (Last 7 days)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-inventory Type="List" Hidden="False" | stats max(Version) as maxVersion,min(Version) as minVersion by Id,WebId,Title | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT Title as WebTitle | evals Updates = maxVersion - minVersion | sort - Update | table WebTitle,Title,Updates | rename WebTitle as "Web Title",Title as "List Title",Updates as "# Updates"

table.title: Most Popular Lists (Access Count)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=4 Event=3 | stats count by ItemId,FarmId | lookup SPList Id as ItemId OUTPUT WebId,Title | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT Title as WebTitle | table WebTitle,Title,count | sort - count | rename WebTitle as "Web Title",Title as "List Title",count as "# Accesses"

table.title: Most Popular Lists (User Count)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=4 Event=3 | stats dc(UserName) as count by ItemId,FarmId | lookup SPList Id as ItemId OUTPUT WebId,Title | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT Title as WebTitle | table WebTitle,Title,count | sort - count | rename WebTitle as "Web Title",Title as "List Title",count as "# Users"
